thag2.36:1.1_0: Whose mind is like a rock,
thag2.36:1.3_0: Free of desire for desirable things,
thag2.36:1.4_0: not getting annoyed when things are annoying?
thag2.36:1.5_0: From where will suffering strike one
thag2.36:1.6_0: whose mind is developed like this?

thag2.36:2.4_0: not getting annoyed when things are annoying?
